My wife and I are enjoying our visit to Gomoa Fetteh, a fast developing coastal Town and growing tourist hub in the central region of Ghana. 

Its encouraging to see the huge economic potential of the area coming to fruition with more opportunities and expansion to follow. #Ghana https://t.co/KnVZE0QRbn

My wife and I had the pleasure of attending @TEDxAccra at the @UnivofGh. It was a remarkable event showcasing many of Ghana’s rising stars who are driving change and lasting impact on the continent. 

Many congratulations to all. 

#TEDxAccra #AgentsofChange https://t.co/qWK66PeOKm
